mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_saving (fund_id, user_id, saving_amount) VALUES (#{fundId}, #{userId}, #{savingAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT us.user_saving_id AS userSavingId, us.saving_amount AS savingAmount, p.name AS savingName, s.period_days AS periodDays, s.interest_rate AS interestRate, (SELECT image_url FROM image WHERE postId = p.product_id AND image_type = 'Funding' ORDER BY image_id ASC LIMIT 1) AS savingImageUrl FROM user_saving us JOIN fund f ON us.fund_id = f.fund_id JOIN savings s ON f.product_id = s.product_id JOIN financial_product p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY us.user_saving_id DESC
